name: @yamamototea/yamamototea
description: YAMAMOTOTEA is an AI-powered developer assistance platform designed to aid developers in writing and editing code. Leveraging cutting-edge artificial intelligence technologies, YAMAMOTOTEA provides intelligent code suggestions, automated code generation, and real-time code analysis to streamline the development process. Whether you're a seasoned developer seeking efficiency or a novice coder looking for guidance, YAMAMOTOTEA is your comprehensive solution for enhancing productivity and code quality.
author: Evgenii Buz

usage.title: Usage
